text.author: Josh Romero / IEEE Spectrum
text.chatter: The FBI’s FACES face recognition database mostly contains images of law-abiding citizens taken from driver’s license and passport photos.
text.headline: Where the FBI Gets Its Photos
text.source: Source: Center on Privacy and Technology, Georgetown Law
text.title: fbi-faces
